00039 $r=ExecSql($cn,"select md_id,md_lob,md_filename,md_mimetype 
00040                  from document_modele where md_id=".$_REQUEST['md_id']);
00041 if ( pg_num_rows($r) == 0 ) {
00042   echo_error("Invalid Document");
00043   exit;

00061 while ( !feof ($file) )
